entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 46 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 18 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain in the evening then to flurries overnight. Fog patches late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
